§ 2181. Physical fitness of officers The Secretary shall prescribe regulations under which the physical fitness of officers to perform their duties shall be periodically determined. (Added Pub. L. 88–130, § 1(10)(C), Sept. 24, 1963, 77 Stat. 190, § 335; renumbered § 2181, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 112(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4216.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2018—Pub. L. 115–282 renumbered section 335 of this title as this section.
